summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Villa Paris UI/UX improvements with AppShell/Sidebar navigation and Report Azienda functionality. All core features working perfectly including dashboard KPI cards, sidebar navigation, report charts, Excel export, breadcrumb navigation, and mobile responsiveness.
passed_tests: Dashboard page loads correctly with AppShell layout (sidebar + topbar)
Sidebar navigation contains all 8 menu items (Dashboard, Calendario, Eventi, Clienti, Menu Base, Report, Stampe, Impostazioni)
Sidebar has dark theme with amber accent colors as specified
Dashboard KPI cards display correctly (Eventi questo mese, Ospiti previsti, Ricavi stimati, Clienti totali)
Navigation to Report Azienda page works seamlessly
Report Azienda page loads with complete filters section (Anno, Data da/a, Tipo evento, Luogo)
Report Azienda displays 4 KPI cards (Eventi Totali: 2, Ospiti Totali: 120, Ricavi Totali: €9,600, Ticket Medio: €80)
Report charts render correctly (Ricavi per Mese bar chart, Eventi per Mese line chart)
Additional charts present (Ospiti per Mese, Eventi per Tipo pie chart)
Excel download button 'Scarica Excel' is present and clickable
API /api/report/azienda.xlsx generates valid Excel file (tested via backend)
API /api/report/stats returns correct monthly statistics with proper data structure
API /api/eventi returns events data for dashboard calculations
API /api/clienti returns client data for dashboard statistics
Breadcrumb navigation works in topbar with proper Home > Report > Report Azienda structure
Mobile responsiveness works perfectly - sidebar toggles correctly on mobile viewport
Mobile menu button appears and functions on mobile devices
Sidebar opens and closes properly on mobile with overlay functionality
AppShell layout maintains proper structure across different screen sizes
All interactive elements have proper hover states and transitions
Footer displays correct Villa Paris branding and version information
Topbar includes search functionality and notification bell
Quick actions section on dashboard with navigation buttons works correctly

success_percentage.backend: 100% - All report APIs (stats, Excel export) and dashboard data APIs working correctly
success_percentage.frontend: 100% - All UI/UX components, navigation, charts, and mobile responsiveness working perfectly
